= SNP_mutator_v2.pl=

SNP_mutator_v2.pl is a perl script that will generate a series of single nucleotide variations, as well as small insertions and deletions.


= Usage =
{{{
usage: SNP_mutator.pl -f <Chr##.fa> [-omid]

}}}
 * -o Output File. Default = snp_mutator_output.vcf
 * -m Total number of Desired point Mutations
 * -i Total number of Desired Insertions
 * -d Total number of Desired Deletions
